AI-Powered Smart Kettle: This electric kettle comes equipped with an AI-powered temperature control system that can detect the type of tea or coffee being brewed and adjust the temperature accordingly. Smart Kettle with Water Purification: This electric kettle features a built-in water purification system that removes impurities and minerals from the water, resulting in a cleaner and more refreshing drink.
